rev.comment: rm sentence about roller hockey game in parking lot. unable to find citations for this. is it still even going on today? not really notable, anyways.
rev.diff:
Line 78: Line 78:
==Corporate culture==
==Corporate culture==
[[Image:Googler2-non.jpg|250 px|right|thumb|A [[Vehicle registration plate|license plate]] seen in the Googleplex parking lot]]
[[Image:Googler2-non.jpg|250 px|right|thumb|A [[Vehicle registration plate|license plate]] seen in the Googleplex parking lot]]
â
Google is particularly known for its relaxed corporate culture, reminiscent of the [[Dot-com]] boom. Google's corporate philosophy is based on many casual principles including, [[Don't be evil|"You can make money without doing evil"]], "You can be serious without a suit" and, "Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun." A complete list of corporate fundamentals is available on Google's website.<ref>"[http://www.google.com/corporate/tenthings.html Google Corporate Philosophy]." ''[[Google]].'' Retrieved on [[August 31]], [[2006]].</ref> The company encourages equality within corporate levels. Twice a week there is a [[roller hockey]] game in the company parking lot.{{cn}} Google's relaxed corporate culture can also be seen externally through their holiday variations of the [[Google logo]].
+
Google is particularly known for its relaxed corporate culture, reminiscent of the [[Dot-com]] boom. Google's corporate philosophy is based on many casual principles including, [[Don't be evil|"You can make money without doing evil"]], "You can be serious without a suit" and, "Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun." A complete list of corporate fundamentals is available on Google's website.<ref>"[http://www.google.com/corporate/tenthings.html Google Corporate Philosophy]." ''[[Google]].'' Retrieved on [[August 31]], [[2006]].</ref> The company encourages equality within corporate levels. Google's relaxed corporate culture can also be seen externally through their holiday variations of the [[Google logo]].
==="Twenty percent" time===
==="Twenty percent" time===
